sources.title: Chapter 2 - Refrigerated Condensers (EPA). Appendix A: Table A-1 and Table A-2 (Lange's Handbook reprint).
Compilation of Henry's law constants (version 5.0.0)
sources.publisher: henrys-law.org / Max-Planck Institute for Chemistry (Rolf Sander)

sources.title: A modified electrolyte NRTL model... Application to the MEA-H2O-CO2 system (supporting tables for NRTL/eNRTL parameters)
SIMS 2019 Proceedings paper reporting PR kij value 0.19 for water/CO2 used for dew point calculations
SIMCO legacy built-in Antoine coefficients (migrated from engine code)
sources.notes: Used to seed missing Antoine coefficients (including gases) while transitioning to DB-driven approach.

sources.title: SIMCO legacy built-in critical properties (migrated from engine code)
sources.notes: Tc and Pc values migrated from legacy constants.

sources.title: SIMCO legacy built-in Henry constants in water at 25°C (migrated from engine code)
sources.notes: Henry constants stored as H (Pa) with van't Hoff enthalpy parameter.

sources.title: SIMCO legacy built-in NRTL dg12/dg21 parameter sets (migrated from engine code)
sources.notes: Binary NRTL parameters stored as constant dg12,dg21,alpha.

components.name: Acetone
components.description: Ketone solvent; used for model validation.

components.name: Benzene
components.description: Aromatic hydrocarbon; used for model validation.

components.name: Methane
components.description: Primary component of natural gas streams being sweetened.

components.name: Chloroform
components.description: Chlorinated solvent; used for model validation.

components.name: Carbon dioxide
components.description: Primary target in post-combustion capture and natural gas sweetening.

components.name: Ethanol
components.description: Common organic; used for model validation.

components.name: Water
components.description: Universal diluent for amine solutions; also used in SO₂/HCl scrubbing.

components.name: Hydrogen sulfide
components.description: Toxic acid gas removed in gas sweetening (Claus process feed).

components.name: Hydrogen chloride
components.description: Strong acid gas from waste incineration and chlorinated feedstocks.

components.name: Methyldiethanolamine
components.description: Tertiary amine, selective for H₂S over CO₂ in gas sweetening.

components.name: Monoethanolamine
components.description: Primary amine, benchmark solvent for post-combustion CO₂ capture.

components.name: Methanol
components.description: Physical solvent (Rectisol process) for CO₂ and H₂S at low temperatures.

components.name: Nitrogen
components.description: Major component of flue gas (~79%% of air).

components.name: Ammonia
components.description: Basic gas scrubbed from fertilizer off-gas, SCR slip, and waste streams.

components.name: Nitric oxide
components.description: Primary NOx component in combustion flue gas.

components.name: Nitrogen dioxide
components.description: Secondary NOx component; more soluble and reactive than NO.

components.name: Heptane
components.description: Alkane; used for model validation.

components.name: Hexane
components.description: Alkane; used for model validation.

components.name: Oxygen
components.description: Present in flue gas; causes amine degradation in absorbers.

components.name: Dimethyl ether of polyethylene glycol (DEPG/Selexol family)
Sulfur dioxide
components.description: Flue gas desulfurization (FGD) target from power plants and smelters.

components.name: Toluene
components.description: Aromatic hydrocarbon; used for model validation.

absorption_kinetics.description: CO2 absorption in aqueous MEA — fast pseudo-first-order
absorption_kinetics.E_notes: E=200-500 typical for 30wt% MEA at 40°C with low CO2 loading. Conservative estimate.

absorption_kinetics.description: CO2 absorption in aqueous MDEA — slow reaction, base-catalyzed hydration
absorption_kinetics.E_notes: Low E for CO2-MDEA; selective for H2S over CO2

absorption_kinetics.description: H2S absorption in aqueous MEA — instantaneous proton transfer
H2S absorption in aqueous MDEA — instantaneous proton transfer
SO2 absorption in water — physical + hydration
absorption_kinetics.E_notes: Physical absorption; SO2 is moderately soluble

absorption_kinetics.description: NH3 absorption in water — physical, very soluble
absorption_kinetics.E_notes: Physical absorption; NH3 highly soluble in water

absorption_kinetics.description: CO2 absorption in water — physical only
